Message:
Darkness overtook me,
and I lost control.
I couldn’t tell friend or foe,

attacking all who approached
me one after another.
The one to bring me back was him,

and it wasn’t just because of
the power from that
strange staff of his.

For some reason,
just being around him
calms me down.
It’s as if I’m next to the chief...

Though, they don’t resemble
each other in any way.

But thanks to him,
I could remember what
the chief really said.

I’m not as strong
as the chief yet.

and the final one to
inherit the chief’s wisdom,
